name: Pirates & Pearls
description:
Ahoy, landlubber! Ready to set sail with the bravest pirate on the high seas in Pirates & Pearls®?

It’s time to plunder yer way through hundreds of puzzle matching levels filled with precious loot. Build mighty ships, sail the ocean, pillage wealthy ports and construct gold mines while perfecting yer puzzle-solving and buccaneering skills.

Yer first task: swap and match 3 gems to complete the level before ye run out of moves and must walk the plank!

If ye succeed, then ye must use and combine special boosters and power-ups to blast yer way through hundreds more levels, complete with boatloads of pesky obstacles and special puzzle-solving tools.

Take on this fearsome journey alone or play with yer mates to increase yer haul and become pirate kings!

Think ye to be a real swaggering pirate? Then weigh anchor and hoist the mizzen! Download now!

Pirates & Pearls Features:

MATCH 3 PUZZLE GAMES
● Conquer hundreds of puzzle matching levels over dozens of swashbuckling chapters
● Match 3 of the gems that drop onto the board
● Defy the odds with lifesaving boosters and clutch power-ups
● Play with yer best mates and see who can capture the most treasure

BUILD YER PIRATE CREW
● Build pirate ships
● Construct gold mines and gather treasure
● Assemble the best pirate crew around

PUZZLES AHOY
● Get regular free updates with thrilling new levels, features and more
● New puzzles added all the time

SUPPORTED BY YER MATEYS
● iPhone XR Display support
● iPad Pro Display Support
● Game Center Support

Set sail for an adventure of pirates, puzzles and plunder! Download Pirates & Pearls today!

While this game is absolutely free to play, you have the ability to unlock optional bonuses via in-app purchases from within the game. You may disable in-app purchases in your device settings.

Game available in: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Brazilian Portuguese, Russian, Korean, Chinese, Japanese, Traditional Chinese
